cells.data:
1. (Only if pushing docs in step 12) Sync BCL-developer-docs (GitHub) and files-brightcove-com (SmartSVN - update to latest revision)  THIS MUST BE DONE TO AVOID POSSIBLE CONFLICTS IN LATER STEPS. DO NOT PROCEED UNTIL THIS IS DONE.
  2. Connect to BostonVPN
  3. Download TeamCity zip (if no login, click Log in as guest link.
  4. Copy zip and paste into files and sync with http://files.brightcove.com/ root (SmartSVN or Cornerstone)
    1. Create local working copy (only initially)
    2. move android sdk zip file to trunk/html folder
    3. right-click on zip file, select Add to working copy
    4. right-click on zip file again, select Commit changes (include a comment)
  5. Sync  BCL-Content repo (make sure you have latest files in repo)
    1. Copy TeamCity zip into BCL-Content/android-sdks
  6. Sync  BCL-developer-docs repo
    1. Make appropriate folder in /BCL-developer-docs/en/video-cloud/mobile-sdks/brightcove-player-sdk-for-android/reference/versions
    2. From unzipped TeamCity file, copy over all files from the /git/BCL-Content/android-sdks/android-native-player-public-4.3.2/docs into appropriate version folder
    3. Use Kaleidoscope to check newest and one version old just to be sure they seem everything is copied (or a visual look of files copied)
    4. Copy these docs files into the brightcove-player-sdk-for-android/reference/current folder, overwriting the existing contents.
  7. Check un-copied folders for any docs that might have been added (un-copied folders should only contain Java files)
    1. if yes, figure out where to put doc files
  8. Edit landing page (/git/BCL-developer-docs/en/video-cloud/mobile-sdks/brightcove-player-sdk-for-android/index.html) with new version number (search and replace)
    1. Check locally that links work Download, Release Notes and Documentation
  9. Edit navigation grunt file (/git/BCL-developer-docs/en/grunt/source/mobile-sdks.json). Change 6 URLs to new version number
  10. Grunt to update the navigation
  11. Then push live.
    1. Sync to Perform using Smart Sync
    2. Sync BCL-developer-docs
    3. See Push Docs Live process note.
